params.name: text_config
params.description: The config object of the text backbone. Can be any of LlamaConfig or MistralConfig.

params.name: ignore_index
params.description: The ignore index for the loss function.

params.name: image_token_index
params.description: The image token index to encode the image prompt.

params.name: vocab_size
params.description: Vocabulary size of the PaliGemmamodel. Defines the number of different tokens that can be represented by theinputs_ids passed when calling ~PaliGemmaForConditionalGeneration

params.name: projection_dim
params.description: Dimension of the multimodal projection space.

params.name: hidden_size
params.description: Dimension of the hidden layer of the Language model.
